lumis.portal.user

Interface IUserManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IConfigDeleter
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IUserManagerSPI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserManager

    @StableMinor(version="8.1",
             sinceVersion="4.0")
public interface IUserManager
extends IConfigDeleter
    Class interface responsible for managing operations on the portal users.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 17593 $ $Date: 2015-07-17 11:21:36 -0300 (Fri, 17 Jul 2015) $

           UserConfig userConfig,
           ITransaction transaction)
    throws ManagerException,
           PortalException
        Adds a user to the portal and returns the identifier of the user added. If the userId is not provided, a new userId is created.
        Parameters:

        userConfig -
        transaction -
        Returns:
        a String Identifier of the user added

      • getByOrigin

        Collection<UserConfig> getByOrigin(SessionConfig sessionConfig,
                                   String origin,
                                   ITransaction transaction)
                            throws ManagerException,
                                   PortalException
        Return the users, searching by the user's origin.
        Parameters:
        sessionConfig - the user session information.
        origin - the origin.
        transaction - the transaction for persistence access.
        Returns:
        the UserConfig instances, or an empty collection if none was found.
        Throws:
        DaoException
        PortalException
        ManagerException
        Since:
        4.0.8
